item.title: SageMath version 8.6 on Debian Buster
item.description: This is a short note to follow up on a previous one where I reported the steps to install the latest release of Sage using the GitHub repository. At that time Sage version 8.3 was not available on Debian Buster but now version 8.6 is available on Buster! item.title: More digits!
item.description:

item.title: Building Sage 8.3 from sources on Debian Testing
item.description: Sage is a powerful mathematics software I use to do symbolic computation.
